<p><img src="data:image/jpeg;base64," alt="Image result for horse of the year 2019" /></p>
<p><br />Horse of the Year 2019 was in Hawkes Bay, 12-17 March.</p>
<p>Two of our students took part in the competition.</p>
<p>Jaime Hogg got an 8th placing in Title Class - Show Hunter;&nbsp;and 6th placing - High Point Series riding 'Step It Up'.</p>
<p>Jadyn Sorenson was placed 6th - Handy Hunter on 'Sonrise Essence'.</p>
<p>Congratulations and well done to you both!</p>
